data.text: @BrendaH80003264 @CBCNB It is just a bad flu/cold. Before Covid people were dying from the cold/flu yearly, it just wasnt posted for public knowledge.
@CBCNB Just stop!!!!  Live your life.  Let others live theirs!!!

@NatashaMatchet1 @CBCNB Tell that to the families who have lost loved ones due to Covid. Tell them it's just a cold. Everyone reacts different and to those who you said was just a cold they should be grateful it wasn't worse.
@the_franktank @CBCNB We will. Its a mask. Not a big deal.
@HeritageRancher @CBCNB You all continue wearing them dude. I respect the choice. You should do the same.

@the_franktank @CBCNB Masks work dude. Kids are very adaptable. It’s the parents that are the issue. The parents that are snowflakes. You have tunnel vision my dude. This pandemic is not done just because Daddy Higgs says so. My kids love wearing masks, because we used it as a teachable moment.
@HeritageRancher @CBCNB Many do. You have tunnel vision my friend. You are clearly uneducated and/or unwilling to see the other side of the discussion.
@the_franktank @CBCNB That unfortunate. My 3 year old is starting to read and can add, subtract, divid and multiply. My 5 year old can read at a grade 2 level. Maybe it’s not the masks fault….
@CBCNB Can the next story be about where the petition ends up? https://t.co/CyGktn5i8A
